description:
Today we’ll be painting the Warhammer Underworlds Core game - Embergard! 

Join Jake as he shows you how quick and easy it is to paint this set with only ten paints!

So grab your paintbrushes, and maybe a flashlight, and get stuck in!
Here's a list of paints we’ve used:

Base Paints:
Abbadon black
Balthasar Gold
Kantor Blue
Leadbelcher 
Phoenician Purple
Rakarth Flesh
Retributor Armour
Steel Legion Drab
Waaagh! Flesh

Shade Paints:
Agrax Earthshade 

Tools:
Clippers
S Base
M Layer
If you're new to painting, our Citadel Colour Painting Essentials playlist hosts an array of beginner-friendly videos to help you get started.

Follow for more Warhammer, more often:

- Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/warhammerofficial/
- Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/WarhammerOfficial/
- X: https://x.com/warhammer
- Warhammer Community: https://www.warhammer-community.com/
- Get Warhammer in your inbox: https://ow.ly/6SJq50T3NL1
title: How to Paint: Warhammer: Underworlds Embergard | Beginner | Warhammer Age of Sigmar
